subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Game 4 on Sunday will be Aaron Cook’s first time pitching in a major league game since Aug. 10, and the Rockies will be counting on him to keep their season alive.
snippet: Game 4 on Sunday will be Aaron Cook’s first time pitching in a major league game since Aug. 10, and the Rockies will be counting on him to keep their season alive.
